actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Rural Development Act of 1972 to provide for the use of a State certified census in addition to the decennial census of the United States for purposes of defining the terms "rural" and "rural area".

summary.text: Provides, under the Rural Development Act of 1972, for the use of a State certified census in addition to the decennial census of the United States for purposes of defining the terms "rural" and "rural area".

titles.title: A bill to amend the Rural Development Act of 1972 to provide for the use of a State certified census in addition to the decennial census of the United States for purposes of defining the terms "rural" and "rural area".
